headline.print_headline: Conditions Remain Dire as War Surges On in Gaza
headline.main: Conditions Remain Dire as War Surges On in Gaza

lead_paragraph: The war between Israel and Hamas is intensifying as an Israeli ground operation surges across the Gaza Strip. In the deadliest incident in Gaza thus far, 25 members of one family were killed, including 18 children, by an airstrike on their home. On the Israeli side, the death of 13 soldiers in one day marked the largest number of soldiers killed in combat since the 2006 Lebanon War.
